Description: VTG 1970's Harmony 02814 Electric Guitar & Unitec Hard Shell Padded Flight Case Up for sale is a VTG 1970's Harmony 02814 Electric Guitar & Unitec Hard Shell Padded Flight Case. The guitar comes in very good condition as shown. I don't see and dings or condition issues with the guitar. Plays good and has good action being easy on the fingers. The case is also in good condition but has some staining to the padding inside as shown. The padding inside is not formed for the guitar so additional padding will be needed to ship this safely so the guitar does not slide around inside. The case alone is worth $150!!!
